name: Nidhoggr
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2023 - Theme: Roots

It's a peaceful night in the forest, you're just a lumberjack cutting some wood, but for your misfortune, you messed with the wrong tree...

Credits:

Ale Almeyra
Joaquín Martinez

MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS
